mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard(free_num, mem_num, free_subject, free_content) VALUES(freeB_seq.nextval, #{num}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, f.* FROM (SELECT free_num num, mem_num, (SELECT mem_nickname FROM members WHERE mem_num = mem_num) nickname, free_subject subject, free_content content, free_like "like", free_hate hate, free_status status, free_viewcnt viewcnt, free_regdate regdate FROM freeboard WHERE free_status = 1 ORDER BY free_num DESC) f ) WHERE rnum >= #{page} AND rnum < #{page} + #{row}
SELECT count(*) FROM freeboard WHERE free_status = 1

SELECT free_num num, mem_num, free_subject subject, free_content content, free_like "like", free_hate hate, free_status status, free_viewcnt viewcnt, free_regdate regdate, (SELECT mem_id FROM members WHERE mem_num = mem_num) id, (SELECT mem_nickname FROM members WHERE mem_num = mem_num) nickname FROM freeboard WHERE free_num = #{param1} AND free_status = 1
